about_the_game:
Champion Battlegrounds is a multiplayer Battle Royale game with unique low-poly anime graphics and a strategic, action-packet combat system that allows you to play how you like!

Fight as one of the always growing set of powerful champions chosen by a god that was bored and started a battle royale game. Help a champion get his wish fulfilled by the god by guiding him through this game, so he is the last champion standing.

Enter the battleground against up to 16 other players and enemies, defeat them to get trophies that strengthen your champion and allows you to buy other champions and be the last one standing!

KEY FEATURES:

Choose your champion!

Choose one of a always growing set of champions and enter the battleground to be the last champion standing!

Strategic, action-packet combat

Attack! Evade! Use skills!
And fight with a combat system that allows you to play how you like!
Like to play MOBA style? Use the mouse to move!
Like to play RPG style? Use the WASD keys to move!

Custom battlegrounds

Search or host public or private battleground rounds with one of an always growing set of maps and up to 16 players!

Minimalistic anime styled low-poly graphics

Play in a low-poly world with beautiful minimalistic environments and unique anime styled characters!
